type.name: org.gradle.tooling.model.Task
type.description:
* Represents a task which is executable by Gradle. * *

Note: {@code Task} extends {@code Launchable} since 1.12.

* * @since 1.0-milestone-3

method.name: getDescription
method.description: * Returns the description of this task, or {@code null} if it has no description. * * @return The description of this task, or {@code null} if it has no description. * @since 1.0-milestone-3

method.name: getGroup
method.description: * Returns the group a task belongs to. * * @return the group a task belongs to. * @since 2.5

method.name: getName
method.description: * Returns the name of this task. Note that the name is not necessarily a unique identifier for the task. * * @return The name of this task. * @since 1.0-milestone-3

method.name: getPath
method.description: * Returns the path of this task. This is a fully qualified unique name for this task. * * @return The path of this task. * @since 1.0-milestone-3

property.name: description
property.description: * Returns the description of this task, or {@code null} if it has no description. * * @return The description of this task, or {@code null} if it has no description. * @since 1.0-milestone-3

property.name: group
property.description: * Returns the group a task belongs to. * * @return the group a task belongs to. * @since 2.5

property.name: name
property.description: * Returns the name of this task. Note that the name is not necessarily a unique identifier for the task. * * @return The name of this task. * @since 1.0-milestone-3

property.name: path
property.description: * Returns the path of this task. This is a fully qualified unique name for this task. * * @return The path of this task. * @since 1.0-milestone-3
